rows.label: qst202829_msg0001
rows.name: Friends want mineral appraising?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0002
rows.name: Appraise a mineral?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0003
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: qst202829_msg0004
rows.name: Not right now

rows.label: qst202829_msg0005
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, come back if ever need
appraising services.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0007
rows.name:
All right, time for see what
we have here!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0008
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: qst202829_msg0009
rows.name:
Meh-meh!
This is Himahistone!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0010
rows.name: Is mineral discovered by Mogumogu!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0011
rows.name:
Apparently it named after girlfriend
of Mogumogu, name of Himahi.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0012
rows.name:
Me just hope Mogumogu not later
break up with Himahi and regret
naming decision.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0013
rows.name:
This is Greenmarine, known as
national gemstone of Gula.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0014
rows.name:
Is very beautiful jewel, and produces
characteristic leafy pattern when
soaked in water.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0015
rows.name:
Very popular gemstone with ladies,
so likely to fetch good price.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0016
rows.name:
C-can this really be?!
Is real Lightocyte crystal!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0017
rows.name:
Lightocyte very rare mineral nowadays!
Most treasure hunter never able to find!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0018
rows.name:
Is said to be more beautiful than any
other jewel, due to pathway of light
visible inside crystal!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0019
rows.name:
Friends take good care of this,
mehopes!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0020
rows.name:
Meh-meh...
This unmistakably Trollenite.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0021
rows.name:
Very strange mineral. For some reason
every sample unearthed have shape of
weird-looking humanoid giant.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0022
rows.name:
Not most beautiful of minerals,
but quite valuable for unique quality.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0023
rows.name:
Yes yes yes...
This mineral called Stormstone.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0024
rows.name:
Stormstone has mysterious property
of occasionally create mini tornado
windy effect.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0025
rows.name:
Quite popular in hot springs of
Superbia. Sink stone in water and
pleasant bubbles rise up from below!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0026
rows.name:
Ah yes...
This one called Crystal Dome.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0027
rows.name:
Very delicate formation, easy to break.
Requires special care when excavating.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0028
rows.name:
Dome contains reservoir of water
with many small crystal fragment.
Shake dome and it look like snowing!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0029
rows.name:
Good for selling, but also good for
displaying on desk or mantelpiece!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0030
rows.name: This known as Verdi Crystal.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0031
rows.name:
Also known as Forest Jewel because
of very beautiful green color.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0032
rows.name:
Pippito monster especially fond
of steal this jewel, so take extra
care with storage.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0033
rows.name:
Meh-meh!
This is Lightning Pearl!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0034
rows.name:
Also known as Divine Beast Tear, because is
only produced when lightning strike
certain jellyfish-shape Divine Beasts.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0035
rows.name:
Freshly-made Lightning Pearl is too
sparky to touch for first few days.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0036
rows.name:
So if friends find one in nature,
take care with picking up!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0037
rows.name:
Hm-hm-hm... This scent...
Must be Yawn Lazuli!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0038
rows.name:
Is somewhat unusual gemstone that
smell of sunshine and happiness.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0039
rows.name:
In Iyasaki Village, is traditionally given
to babies. Make them calm for naptime.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0040
rows.name: This is stone called Darkcyte.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0041
rows.name:
Quite rare jewel, only found glowing
softly in very dark place.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0042
rows.name:
Is quite popular for use as charm
to ward off evil spirits.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0043
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh!
This is Absorp Quartz!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0044
rows.name:
Has mysterious property of
absorbing light from vicinity!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0045
rows.name:
Is traded at high price due to
difficulty of finding...

rows.label: qst202829_msg0046
rows.name:
But also considered quite unlucky,
so only handful of enthusiast willing
to actually buy!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0047
rows.name: This one called Gong Crystal.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0048
rows.name:
Known for produce strange ringing
sound at certain interval, so quite
easy to find if listen sharply.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0049
rows.name:
There is certain romance to idea of
stone with ancient sounds trapped
inside. Friends agree?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0050
rows.name:
Aha.
This is Dusky Pearl.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0051
rows.name:
Is interesting mineral that change
color depending on environment.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0052
rows.name:
This one very black, so must have
come from Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0053
rows.name:
So... No new mineral this time.
But if friends find any more mineral for
appraising, please feel free to bring!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0054
rows.name:
All mineral have value. Please take
good care of minerals friends find.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0055
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: qst202829_msg0056
rows.name:
As to be expected, undiscovered
mineral not show up very easy.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0057
rows.name:
Maybe best bet for friends is to
search in unexplored region.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0058
rows.name:
Searching in same places as everyone
else not likely to produce new finds.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0059
rows.name:
But if friends could get to Divine Beast that
nobody ever visit before...

rows.label: qst202829_msg0060
rows.name:
Have much better chance of discover
brand-new mineral!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0061
rows.name:
If friends ever visit such new place,
be sure to collect mineral there.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0062
rows.name:
If friends find unfamiliar type,
me always happy to give appraisal.
